files.patch:
@@ -602,1 +602,1 @@
-    Group specified elements together in overview page.\n\
+    Group specified packages or modules together in overview page.\n\

@@ -513,2 +513,3 @@ -`-group` *name* *p1*`,`*p2...* -: Group the specified packages together in the Overview page. +`-group` *name* *g1*`,`*g2...* +: Group the specified packages, or modules when documenting modular code, + together in the Overview page.
